name: Virat Kohli
description: One of the greatest batsmen of all time, known for his consistency and aggressive batting style. A proven match-winner in all formats.

name: MS Dhoni
description: Legendary captain and finisher, known for his calm demeanor and exceptional leadership skills. A master of run chases.

name: Rohit Sharma
description: A prolific opener with the ability to score big hundreds. Known for his elegant stroke play and timing.

name: Jasprit Bumrah
description: One of the best fast bowlers in the world, known for his deadly yorkers and ability to bowl in any situation.

name: Hardik Pandya
description: A dynamic all-rounder who can change the game with both bat and ball. Known for his explosive batting and handy medium-pace bowling.

name: KL Rahul
description: A versatile batsman who can open the innings or play in the middle order. Known for his elegant stroke play and adaptability.

name: Shubman Gill
description: A young and talented batsman with a classical technique. Known for his ability to anchor the innings.

name: Shreyas Iyer
description: A reliable middle-order batsman who can stabilize the innings and accelerate when needed. Known for his composure under pressure.

name: Prithvi Shaw
description: An aggressive opener who can dominate the powerplay. Known for his fearless approach and quick scoring.

name: Ishan Kishan
description: A left-handed batsman known for his explosive hitting and ability to play match-winning knocks.

name: Mohammed Shami
description: A skilled fast bowler known for his ability to swing the ball and pick up crucial wickets.

name: Yuzvendra Chahal
description: A crafty leg-spinner who can outfox batsmen with his variations. Known for his wicket-taking ability in the middle overs.

name: Kuldeep Yadav
description: A rare left-arm wrist-spinner known for his ability to deceive batsmen with his flight and turn.

name: T Natarajan
description: A left-arm pacer known for his pinpoint yorkers and ability to bowl under pressure in the death overs.

name: Bhuvneshwar Kumar
description: A swing bowler who can move the ball both ways. Known for his accuracy and ability to bowl in the powerplay.

name: Rishabh Pant
description: A dynamic left-handed batsman and wicketkeeper known for his aggressive batting and match-winning abilities.

name: Sanju Samson
description: A stylish batsman and wicketkeeper known for his clean hitting and ability to play elegant shots.

name: KS Bharat
description: A technically sound wicketkeeper-batsman known for his solid glovework and ability to anchor the innings.

name: Jitesh Sharma
description: A hard-hitting wicketkeeper-batsman known for his ability to score quick runs in the lower order.

name: Ravindra Jadeja
description: A world-class all-rounder known for his accurate left-arm spin, explosive batting, and exceptional fielding.

name: Axar Patel
description: A reliable all-rounder who can contribute with both bat and ball. Known for his economical left-arm spin.

name: Washington Sundar
description: A talented off-spin all-rounder who can bat in the top order and bowl economical spells.

name: Venkatesh Iyer
description: A hard-hitting all-rounder who can bowl medium pace and score quick runs in the middle order.

name: Shardul Thakur
description: A handy all-rounder who can contribute with both bat and ball. Known for his ability to pick up crucial wickets.

name: Deepak Chahar
description: A swing bowler who can also contribute with the bat. Known for his ability to swing the ball early in the innings.
